name: russian-menu-translation
description: Russian menu translation for GVIM. Includes some dialog and toolbar captions translation.Although it's koi8-r you may convert it to other russian encoding,change scriptencoding in file and that's it.
install_details: Just download the file and put it in your ~/.vim/lang/   or $VIMRUNTIME/lang/If your system has the correct locale set (ru_RU.KOI8-R) it should work.If not you should "alias the locale". For detailed instructions look in:help multilang-menus

versions.release_notes: Some fixes in translations and new URL.
